mapper.select:
select p.id project_id,p.name `name`,location,construction_org,supervising_org,PM,p.state project_state,s.state_name from project p inner join project_state s on p.state=s.state_id where 1=1
and p.name like CONCAT('%',#{name},'%')
and p.state < 7
and p.state = 7
order by p.create_at desc

select count(*) from project p inner join project_state s on p.state=s.state_id where 1=1
and p.name like CONCAT('%',#{name},'%')
and p.state < 6
and p.state = 6
order by p.create_at desc

select create_by from
`project_early`
`project_start`
`project_before_check`
`project_check`
where state=2 and project_id=#{project_id}

SELECT count(*) FROM project p LEFT JOIN (SELECT * FROM project_settlement WHERE project_settlement.type_id=3 ) s ON p.id=s.project_id where 1=1
and p.name like CONCAT('%',#{name},'%')
order by p.create_at desc
select * from project_type

SELECT p.id project_id,p.name,location,construction_org,supervising_org,supervisor,supervisor_phone,PM,constructor,PM_phone,t.name type_name FROM project p INNER JOIN `project_type` t ON p.project_type=t.id where p.id=#{project_id}
select * from project_settlement_type
select s.id from project_settlement s inner join project_settlement_type t on s.type_id=t.id where project_id=#{project_id} order by s.id limit 1
select * from project_state

SELECT p.*,t.name type_name FROM project p INNER JOIN `project_type` t ON p.project_type=t.id where 1=1
and p.id =#{project_id}

select t.type_name name,s.* from project_settlement s inner join project_settlement_type t on s.type_id=t.id where 1=1
and s.id = #{settlement_id}

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM `abarbeitung` WHERE 1=1
and project_id=#{project_id}
